channel.title: Generations Podcast Series
channel.description: The Generations Podcast Series explores a diverse selection of artists and recordings from the vast Concord Music Group catalog.
channel.itunes:author: ConcordMusicGroup.com
channel.itunes:keywords: Concord Music Group, Jazz, Vocals, Classics, Legends

item.title: A Charlie Brown Christmas
item.description: Legendary producer Lee Mendelson tells the story about how the memorable music from A Charlie Brown Christmas TV special came to be.
item.itunes:author: ConcordMusicGroup.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Legendary producer Lee Mendelson tells the story about how the memorable music from A Charlie Brown Christmas TV special came to be.
item.itunes:summary: Legendary producer Lee Mendelson tells the story about how the memorable music from A Charlie Brown Christmas TV special came to be.

item.title: Various Artists - Basquiat Salutes Jazz
item.description: Artist Jean-Michel Basquiat was heavily influenced by legends of bebop. We explore the music and his story on this episode.
item.itunes:subtitle: Artist Jean-Michel Basquiat was heavily influenced by legends of bebop. We explore the music and his story on this episode.
item.itunes:summary: Artist Jean-Michel Basquiat was heavily influenced by legends of bebop. We explore the music and his story on this episode.

item.title: Miles Davis - The Legendary Prestige Quintet Sessions
